#r "paket:
nuget Fake.Core.Target
nuget Fake.IO.FileSystem //"
#load "./.fake/tryscript.fsx/intellisense.fsx"

open Fake.IO
open Fake.IO.Globbing
open Fake.IO.Globbing.Operators
let files = !! "files/a*.txt"

// for file in files do
//     printfn "File: %s" file

files
    |> Seq.iter (fun x -> printfn "File: %s" x)

// files
//     >> Seq.iter (fun x -> printfn "File: %s" x)
// This file is automatically generated by FAKE
// This file is needed for IDE support only
#if !FAKE
#load "intellisense_lazy.fsx"
#endif
